Citation for morning.content: We have become, and the kingdom has become God, and praise be to God, there is no god but God alone, He has no partner, His is the kingdom and His is the praise, and He is capable of everything.

Citation for morning.description: Whoever says it with certainty in it when evening comes, and he dies that night, he will enter Paradise, and so will he when he wakes up.
Whoever says it in the morning and in the evening, it is incumbent upon God to please him on the Day of Resurrection.
Citation for morning.content: I accept God as my Lord, Islam as my religion, and Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, as my Prophet.

Citation for morning.description: Whoever says it, God will free him from the Fire.
Whoever says it, Allah will protect him from the affairs of this world and the Hereafter.

Citation for morning.content: In the name of God, with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven harms, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

Citation for morning.Content: We are on the authority of the break of Islam, and on the word of the sane, and on the religion of our Prophet Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, and peace be upon him.

Citation for morning.content: Glory be to God and His praise is the number of His creation, the satisfaction of Himself, the weight of His Throne, and the ink of His words.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty, and I seek refuge in You from the torment of the grave, there is no god but You.

O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord of all Oh, and your king, I see that there is no god but you, I seek refuge in you from the evil of my soul and from the evil of the Satan and his blessing, and that I have a good one.
I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He has created.

Citation for morning.description: Whoever prays in the morning and in the evening, my intercession will meet him on the Day of Resurrection.
Citation for morning.content: O Allah, may blessings and peace be upon our Prophet Muhammad.
O Allah, we seek refuge in You from associating anything we know with You, and we ask Your forgiveness for that which we do not know.

Citation for morning.Content: Oh God, I seek refuge in you from the humiliation and sorrow, and I seek refuge in you from the miracle and the laziness, and I seek refuge in you from the coward, and the slander,

Citation for morning.content: Oh God, I ask you for useful knowledge, good sustenance, and acceptable deeds.

Citation for morning.description: It was for him the justice of ten slaves, and a hundred good deeds were recorded for him, and a hundred bad deeds were erased from him, and it was a protection for him from Satan.
Citation for morning.content: There is no god but God alone, He has no partner.

Citation for morning.Description: Its sins were landed, and if it is like the sea of the sea. No one will come on the day of the resurrection with the best of what is the same.
Citation for morning.content: Glory be to God and His praise.

Citation for morning.description: One hundred good deeds, and one hundred bad deeds will be erased from him, and they will be a protection for him from Satan until evening.
Citation for morning.content: I ask forgiveness from God and repent to Him

Evening prayers.contente: We are the most important of the king for God and the praise of God, there is no god but God and his alone, I do not have your partner for him, he has the right and he has praise, and he is for everything that is capable of this night and the worst after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and bad old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment in the Fire and the punishment in the grave.

Evening prayers.description: Whoever says it with certainty in it when evening comes, and he dies that night, he will enter Paradise, and so will he when he wakes up.
Whoever says it in the morning and in the evening, it is incumbent upon God to please him on the Day of Resurrection.
Evening prayers.content: I accept God as my Lord, Islam as my religion, and Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, as my Prophet.

Evening prayers.description: Whoever says it, God will free him from the Fire.
Evening prayers.Content: Oh God, I have touched you, and I am the load of your throne, your angels, and all of you, and you are God, there is no God.

Evening prayers.description: Whoever says it in the evening has given thanks for his day.
Evening prayers.content: Oh God, whatever blessing has afflicted me or one of Your creation, it is from You alone, with no partner, so to You be praise and to You be thanks.

Evening prayers.description: Whoever says it, Allah will protect him from the affairs of this world and the Hereafter.

Evening prayers.content: In the name of God, with whose name nothing on earth or in heaven harms, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

Evening prayers.Content: We are on the authority of Islam, and on the word of the sane, and on the religion of our Prophet Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, and peace be upon him.

Evening prayers.content: Glory be to God and His praise is the number of His creation, the satisfaction of Himself, the weight of His Throne, and the ink of His words.
O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty, and I seek refuge in You from the torment of the grave, there is no god but You.

Evening prayers.contente: We are the most important of the king of God, Lord of the two worlds.

Evening prayers.content: I seek refuge in the perfect words of God from the evil of what He has created.

Evening prayers.description: Whoever prays in the morning and in the evening, my intercession will meet him on the Day of Resurrection.
Evening prayers.content: O Allah, may blessings and peace be upon our Prophet Muhammad.
O Allah, we seek refuge in You from associating anything we know with You, and we ask Your forgiveness for that which we do not know.

Evening prayers.Content: Oh God, I seek refuge in you from the humiliation and sorrow, and I seek refuge in you from the miracle and the laziness, and I seek refuge in you from the coward, and the slander,

Evening prayers.description: It was for him the justice of ten slaves, and a hundred good deeds were recorded for him, and a hundred bad deeds were erased from him, and it was a protection for him from Satan.
Evening prayers.content: There is no god but God alone, He has no partner.
God has encompassed everything in knowledge.

Evening prayers.Description: Its sins were landed, and if it is like the sea of the sea. No one will come on the day of the resurrection with the best of what is the same.
Evening prayers.content: Glory be to God and His praise.

Prayer Remembrances.content: I ask forgiveness of God, I ask forgiveness of God, I ask forgiveness of God.
There is no god but God alone, He has no partner, His is the kingdom and His is the praise, and He is capable of everything.

There is no god but God, He alone has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is over all things powerful, There is no god but Allah, and religion is pure to Him, even if the unbelievers hate it.
Glory be to God, and praise be to God, and God is greater.
There is no god but God alone, He has no partner.

Prayer Remembrances.description: Ten times after Maghrib and Subh.
Prayer Remembrances.content: There is no god but God alone, He has no partner, His is the kingdom and His is the praise, He gives life and causes death, and He has power over all things.

Prayer Remembrances.description: After the salutation of the Fajr prayer.
Prayer Remembrances.content: Oh God, I ask you for useful knowledge, good sustenance, and deeds that will be accepted.

Prayer Remembrances.description: After the morning and sunset prayers.
Prayer Remembrances.content: Oh God, save me from the fire.

Praises.description: A thousand good deeds will be written for him or a thousand sins will be erased from him.

Praises.Description: Its sins were landed, and if it is like the sea of the sea. No one will come on the day of the resurrection with the best of what is the same.
Praises.content: Glory be to God and His praise

Praises.description: You fill between the heavens and the earth.
Praises.content: Glory be to God and praise be to God

Praises.description: A palm tree was planted for him in Paradise.
Praises.content: Glory be to God the Great and His Praise

Praises.description: Two are heavy in the scale, beloved to the Merciful.
It was for him the justice of ten slaves, and a hundred good deeds were recorded for him, and a hundred bad deeds were erased from him, and it was a protection for him from Satan.
Praises.content: There is no god but God alone, He has no partner.
There is neither might nor power except with God

Praises.description: You fill the servant's scale with good deeds.
Praises.content: Praise be to God, Lord of the worlds.

Praises.description: Whoever prays in the morning and in the evening, my intercession will meet him on the Day of Resurrection.
For the actions of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace.

They are the most beloved speech to God, expiation for sins, planting paradise, and a shield for their speaker from the fire, and dearer to the Prophet, peace be upon him, than what the sun has risen upon, and the righteous women who remain.
Praises.content: Glory be to God, and praise be to God, and there is no god but God, and God is great

Praises.description: The best remembrance is there is no god but God.
Praises.content: there is no god but God

Praises.description: Whoever says God is great, twenty good deeds will be recorded for him and twenty bad deeds will be erased from him. God is greater than everything.
The good of this world and the hereafter
Praises.content: Glory be to God, praise be to God, there is no god but God, God is great, God forgive me, God have mercy on me, God grant me sustenance.

Praises.description: The Prophet, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said: I am amazed at her, the gates of heaven were opened for her.
Praises.content: God is greater than great, praise be to God much, and glory be to God morning and evening.

Praises.description: Every time ten sins are erased from him, he is raised ten degrees, and God blesses him ten times, and it is presented to the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace.

Sleep Remembrance.content: In your name, my Lord, I place my side, and in you I raise it.

Sleep Remembrance.Content: Oh God you have succeeded my soul and that you will die for you for you their mills and their life.

Sleep Remembrance.content: In your name, O God, I die and live.
Praise be to God who fed us, gave us drink, sufficed us, and sheltered us. How many of those who have neither sufficiency nor shelter?

Waking Up Remembrances.content: Praise be to God, who brought us to death at times, and to Him is the resurrection.
Praise be to God who healed my body, restored my soul, and permitted me to remember Him.

There is no god but God alone, He has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is over all things, Glory be to God, and praise be to God, there is no god but God, and God is the greatest, and there is neither might nor power except with God, the Most High, the Great. Lord forgive me .

Quranic supplications.content: Our Lord, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.[Al-Baqarah - 201]
Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and bestowed upon us mercy from You. Indeed, You are the Bestower.[Al-Imran-8].
Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.[Al-Imran - 16].
My Lord, grant me from You a good offspring. Indeed, You are Hearing of supplication.[Al-Imran-38].
Our Lord, we have believed in what You have revealed and followed the Messenger, so write us down with the witnesses. [Al-Imran - 53].
Our Lord, forgive us our sins and our extravagance in our affairs, and make our feet firm and give us victory over the unbelieving people.[Al-Imran - 147].
your messengers, and do not disgrace us on the Day of Resurrection, for you will not break the promise.[Al-Imran - 191-194]
Our Lord, do not place us with the unjust people.[Al-A'raf - 47].
Our Lord, pour out patience upon us and cause us to die as Muslims.[Al-A’raf - 126]
Allah suffices me, there is no god but He. In Him I rely, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne. [Al-Tawbah - 129].
Our Lord, do not make us a trial for the wrongdoing people, and save us, by Your mercy, from the unbelieving people.[Yunus - 85-86]
My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer and from my offspring, our Lord, and accept my supplication.[Ibrahim - 40]
Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers on the Day when the reckoning is established.[Ibrahim - 41].
My Lord, cause me to enter the entrance of truth and lead me out to the exit of truth, and grant me from You a supportive authority.[Al-Israa - 80].
Our Lord, give us mercy from You and provide us with guidance in our affairs. [Al-Kahf-10]
My Lord, expand my breast for me and ease my task for me, and loosen the knot from my tongue so that they understand my speech.[Taha - 25-28]
My Lord, increase my knowledge.[Taha - 114]
There is no god but You, Glory be to You. Indeed, I was of the wrongdoers. [The Prophets - 87].
My Lord, do not leave me alone, and You are the best of inheritors.[The Prophets - 89].
My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the insinuations of the devils, and I seek refuge in You, my Lord, from being attacked.[Al-Mu'minun - 97-98]
Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, and You are the Best of the merciful.[Al-Mu'minun - 109]
My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the Best of the merciful.[Al-Mu'minun - 118]

Supplications of the Prophets.content: My Lord, send me down a blessed house, and You are the best of both houses.[Al-Mu’minun-29]
My Lord, help me against the corrupt people. [Al-Ankabut - 30].
Our Lord encompasses all things in knowledge. In God we trust.

Supplications of the Prophets.contente: Lord, I am wrong, my soul, so forgive me. [Al -Qasas - 16]. Mine my chest (25) and make my affairs easy for me (26) and loosen the knot from my tongue (27) so that they understand my speech (28) [Taha - 25-28].

Supplications of the Prophets.content: Indeed, harm has befallen me, and You are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy. [The Prophets - 83].

My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and my parents, and to do righteous deeds that will please You andInclude me with your mercy among your righteous servants. [An-Naml - 19].
There is no god but You, Glory be to You. Indeed, I was of the wrongdoers. [The Prophets - 87].
My Lord, grant me from You a good offspring. You are the Hearer of supplication. [Al-Imran - 38].
I only complain of my grief and grief to God. [Yusuf - 86].

Remembrance of the Mosque.description: a supplication to go to the mosque
Remembrance of the Mosque.contente: O God, make a light in my heart, and in my tongue a light, and make in my hearing a light, and make in my eyesight a light, and make my light, and from the light,

Remembrance of the Mosque.description: a prayer for entering the mosque

Remembrance of the Mosque.Content: He begins with his secret man, and he says: By the name of God and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of God, O God, I ask you from the good of you.
